summary: The diff modifies ShapeShowcases.tsx to reference the three new generated image paths and adds a black frame overlay via CSS box-shadow. However, the actual image files (whiskers-heart-memorial.dim_600x600.png, tweety-hexagon-memorial.dim_600x600.png, nabi-square-memorial.dim_600x600.png) are not present in the diff as added files. The black frame implementation uses an inset box-shadow overlay on the entire card image area rather than around the portrait within the resin mold.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a new heart-shaped resin memorial image that includes a cat portrait, retaining flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the cat's portrait within the resin mold.
missing_requirements.reason: No new image file whiskers-heart-memorial.dim_600x600.png appears in the added files section of the diff. The image is only referenced in code but not generated/added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a new hexagon-shaped resin memorial image that includes a bird portrait, retaining flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the bird's portrait within the resin mold.
missing_requirements.reason: No new image file tweety-hexagon-memorial.dim_600x600.png appears in the added files section of the diff. The image is only referenced in code but not generated/added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the square resin memorial image (Nabi) so the animal portrait has a black frame border surrounding it within the resin mold.
missing_requirements.reason: No new image file nabi-square-memorial.dim_600x600.png appears in the added files section of the diff. The image is only referenced in code but not generated/added.

hallucinated_features.description: Black frame implemented as a CSS inset box-shadow overlay covering the entire card image area, not as a frame around the animal portrait inside the resin mold.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request and constraints explicitly state the black frame must appear around the animal portrait inside the resin mold, not around the entire product card. The diff applies an inset box-shadow to the full image container div, framing the entire image rather than the portrait within the mold.
